body_html: I am also fighting with the API to be able to save a model + weights from an Estimator and then do prediction elsewhere (without necessarily using TF Serving). See here for details: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/43966073/prediction-from-model-saved-with-tf-estimator-estimator-in-tensorflow
body_text: I am also fighting with the API to be able to save a model + weights from an Estimator and then do prediction elsewhere (without necessarily using TF Serving). See here for details: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/43966073/prediction-from-model-saved-with-tf-estimator-estimator-in-tensorflow
body: I am also fighting with the API to be able to save a model + weights from an `Estimator` and then do prediction elsewhere (without necessarily using TF Serving). See here for details: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/43966073/prediction-from-model-saved-with-tf-estimator-estimator-in-tensorflow
